Entries.default: "Aye, and where'd you think you're going?"

"Someone's looking to die."

The pirate draws and aims his pistol, dead set at your chest.
[Back away with your hands up.] "It won't happen again."

"Come, then. I'll see you out."

He nods gruffly, boots scuffing the ground as he shoves you around by your shoulder.

"See that it doesn't."

Glaring, the pirate points you to retreat with the end of his flintlock.
"What did I tell you? Be off now. Or I'm likely to get ugly."

"Now you've done it."

He lifts a horn, readying to blow it.
"So you and Benny came to an agreement, eh? Guess that means you've free run of the fort, same as our crew."
